column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Gunshots were fires at about 2 am on 26 September 2019. outside Preah Kossomak
column4: on 265 and 150 streets in Sangkat Teuk Laak II
column5: Khan Toul Kork.------A security source who was on duty at the scene said that a white car drove along 265
column6: and fired a shot from the window when it reached the back of the hospital. The car then drove off a short distance and fired again.------ Local authorities came down and retrieved the bullet casings and wil search for the perpetrators to prosecuted them. ------TD NEWS
